item.description: Join me for a 14 mile bike ride along the Canal.  I need a good practice ride in preparation for the 25 miles I'll be doing for the Rodman Ride for Kids on the 24th!  Sorry I can't schedule the ride earlier in the day--I'll be dropping my daughter off at a b-day party at 1, then heading for the Canal.  If you have any tweens/teens that would like to come along for the ride, they're welcome!  Bring water/snacks.
item.how_to_find_us: Parking lot by Scusset Beach Canal entrance

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Bike Ride/Cape Cod Canal
